summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Tuesday, July 30, 2019. It lists staff positions, shifts, and assignments, including a 'Special Assignments' section and a note about a 'Back Page Categorise'. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed on the roster with an 'OT (NC)' designation, indicating overtime or a special assignment.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed on the roster's back page with a 'DAY OFF' designation and a 'VR' note.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Tuesday, July 30, 2019.
The roster includes various staff positions such as CAPTAIN, LT, SEC OFFICER, SALLY OFF, CONTROL, and units like SHU (Special Housing Unit).
A 'Special Assignments' section and a 'Back Page Categorise' note are present, indicating possible special monitoring or protocols.
Two named staff members are listed: Thomas, M (with OT designation) and Noel, T (with DAY OFF designation).
The document timestamp is 07/29/2019 11:45:45 PM, suggesting it was prepared the night before the shift.
